youtube:
Ki te kimi i o korero RTMP mo YouTube, takiuru ki to putea YouTube ka whakatere ki te WAIHANGA > Haere ora. Ka kite koe i te mata e whai ake nei:
{{youtubeLive}}
.Tapahia "URL Stream" ka whakauru ki te mara "Whakapiri RTMP URL ki konei". Whai muri, kapehia te "Kī Stream" ka whakapiri ki te mara "Kī Stream". Paatohia te "Haere Ora" ki te timata i te roma ora.
{{rtmpLive}}
facebook:
Ka taea e koe te rere ki to korero ma te RTMP mai i te wharangi Waihanga Live a Facebook (me te paato i te Waihanga Rere Ora) ma te paatene ranei i te paatene Ora i te waahi Waihanga o te wharangi, i te whaarangi ranei e hiahia ana koe ki te rere. Ka kawea koe ki te Kaihanga Live a Facebook.
Panuku ki raro i te kaitoro arokite. Me mohio kei raro i te "Tīmata" kua tautuhia te tahua takaiho ki te Whakamahia nga Kī Stream. Ka kitea e koe te RTMP URL me te Stream Key mo tenei haerenga. (Tuhipoka: Ka kitea tonu to tirohanga ataata ki te kokonga matau o raro.) {{facebookLive}} Tāruatia "URL Server" ka kuhu ki te mara "Whakapiri RTMP URL ki konei". Whai muri, kapehia te "Kī Stream" ka whakapiri ki te mara "Kī Stream". Paatohia te "Haere Ora" ki te timata i te roma ora.
{{rtmpLive}}
